
                            
                            <p>京东下单，金额大于30，跳VX付款有工行xyk30-5立减，自测，或许买e卡也行，自行测试吧 <br>  <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202412/29/101717ptosi6dvsjwoydfv.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202412/29/101717ptosi6dvsjwoydfv.jpg"> <br>  <br>  <br> </p><p class="pl">只能一次吧</p><p class="pl">度小满扫VX也行，</p><p class="pl">无</p><p class="pl"><br>可以自己码子套</p><p></p>
                            <p>
